summary: A new Follower and Potential Wife! Anna The Ranger!
descriptionHtml:
Anna the Ranger, High Level and High Skills. 

Note: The First Version of the mod will cause problems if she is not following you, she will attack everyone and be attacked by everyone; download the new version which fixes this and also has more beneficial perks.

IMPORTANT:
1. If you want her to look as she does in the picture, Bella\'s Better Females MUST be installed. You will also need to have downloaded the hair mod. Apachii\'s Custom hairs.
2. She CAN be Married.
3. She CANNOT die.
4. She WILL be naked, as i set no default outfit, but she does have armor or clothes in her inventory; depending on which mod you are using.

LOCATION:
-If using the old version (NOT RECOMMENDED) she is found inside Faendal\'s house.
-If using the new version, she is found inside the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood.

Mod\'s Recommended/Needed:
-Bella\'s Better Females - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812 
-Apachii Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168 

I hope you enjoy this mod and it meets criteria you were looking for.. :D

Remember.. Use of the first mod is not recommended; However if you insist on using it, she is found in Faendal\'s house in Riverwood. The Latest Version fixes the issues with the original file and is now placed in a different location.
author: AD
